examples.example: 经过大家差不多一个月的努力，项目终于取得了成功。

translate.english: After the efforts of everyone for almost a month, the project finally achieved success.

examples.example: 这次考试我的成绩和第一名差不多，我已经很满意了。

translate.english: My score in this exam is almost the same as that of the first place, and I am already very satisfied.

examples.example: 我和他的能力差不多，但我会更加努力去提升自己。

translate.english: My ability is about the same as his, but I will work harder to improve myself.
